---
title: "Interactive Scatter Plots with polychart"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(polychart)
```

Define the data

```{r}
data = mtcars
x = 'wt'
y = 'mpg'
group = 'cyl'
```

Load ggplot, and define ggplot object

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
sp <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=wt, y=mpg)) + geom_point(shape=1, aes(colour=am)) 
gg <- sp + facet_grid(vs ~.) + ggtitle("This is the title!")
```

provide polychart with the ggplot scatter plot object

```{r, echo=FALSE}
polychart(gg_obj = gg, data_cols=c("drat","hp","qsec"))
```
